title: Implement Fair Tank Selection Timer
description: Develop a timer system that ensures each player has exactly 15 seconds to select their tank without feeling rushed.
implementation_notes: Integrate the timer into the sys_tank_selection system. Ensure visual feedback (e.g., countdown) is displayed on the UI. Test for edge cases where players may disconnect or skip selection.

title: Balance Tank Selection Between Teams
description: Ensure both teams have equal opportunities to pick tanks during the selection phase.
implementation_notes: Modify the sys_tank_selection logic to alternate picks between teams fairly. Implement safeguards to prevent duplicate selections and ensure all available tanks are accessible to both sides.

title: Display Mission Objectives After Tank Selection
description: Show mission objectives clearly for 5 seconds after the tank selection process ends.
implementation_notes: Integrate with the sys_tank_selection system to trigger the display of obj_mission_display immediately after selections are finalized. Use animations or highlights to make text easily readable within the 5-second window.
